description: This example demonstrates Paraglide integration with SvelteKit and the debug metadata plugin.
home_content: This is the home page of our SvelteKit example with Paraglide internationalization.
about_content: Learn more about how Paraglide works with SvelteKit to provide seamless i18n support.
